constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 201 (Thursday, November 18, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MACE:
H.R. 6040.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 7 of Section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H6609]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11 Robert Smalls Parkway Suite C, in Beaufort, South Carolina, as the "Robert Smalls Post Office".
